posts.post_content: Have been on the hunt for one for a while, can't find any for sale at any price in any condition, they seem to just not circulate very often. If anyone has one they might be willing to sell or trade, please let me know, thank you!

Send me an email to [url]oldjudge@gmail.com[/url] and I will send images. Is there any pose in particular you are looking for?

Jay
